placeholders.HERO_SUBHEADING_TEXT: Pure, refreshing water delivered to your doorstep with just a tap
placeholders.FOOTER_TEXT: © 2023 AquaPure. Refreshing lives, one bottle at a time.
placeholders.NEWSLETTER_SUBHEADING_TEXT: Sign up for our newsletter to receive hydration tips and exclusive offers
placeholders.ABOUT_MISSION_STATMENT: To provide convenient access to pure, refreshing water for everyone, everywhere
placeholders.ABOUT_VISION_STATEMENT: A world where staying hydrated is effortless and eco-friendly
placeholders.ABOUT_VALUES_STATEMENT: Quality, Convenience, Sustainability, and Customer Satisfaction
placeholders.CONTACT_SUBHEADER_TEXT: Have a question or feedback? We're all ears!
placeholders.FAQ_QUESTION_01_TEXT: How quickly can I get my water delivered?
placeholders.FAQ_ANSWER_01_TEXT: We offer same-day delivery for orders placed before 2 PM in most areas.
placeholders.FAQ_QUESTION_02_TEXT: What types of water do you offer?
placeholders.FAQ_ANSWER_02_TEXT: We offer spring water, purified water, and alkaline water in various sizes.
placeholders.FAQ_ANSWER_03_TEXT: Yes, we use 100% recycled plastic bottles and offer a bottle return program.
placeholders.FAQ_SUBHEADER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about AquaPure
